title: Sparse coding with an overcomplete basis set: A strategy employed by V1?

tldr.text: These deviations from linearity provide a potential explanation for the weak forms of non-linearity observed in the response properties of cortical simple cells, and they further make predictions about the expected interactions among units in response to naturalistic stimuli.
